mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '0') AS RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, WD_DCD, DMN_YN, STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqStwdMapper.selectExistsWordCheck */ STWD_ID FROM WAQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND ROWNUM =1 LIMIT 0,1

SELECT /* WaqStwdMapper.selectrqstStndWordListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.STWD_ID, A.STWD_LNM, IFNULL(A.STWD_PNM,'-') AS STWD_PNM, A.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.ENG_MEAN, A.CCH_NM, A.ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM, A.WD_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , A.DMN_YN, A.STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY RQST_SNO
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqStwdMapper.insert */ INTO WAQ_STWD (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) VALUES (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT /* WaqStwdMapper.insertwam2waq */ INTO WAQ_STWD (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD,ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, WD_DCD, RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID, DMN_YN, STND_ASRT) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo} , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_STWD X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO
, A.STWD_ID, A.STWD_LNM, A.STWD_PNM , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD ,A.ENG_MEAN, A.CCH_NM, A.ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.WD_DCD , NOW() , #{reqmst.rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , A.DMN_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_STWD A WHERE (A.STWD_ID,A.STND_ASRT) IN
( #{item.stwdId} , #{item.stndAsrt} )
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C' , 'U')

INSERT /* WaqStwdMapper.insertSelective */ INTO WAQ_STWD
STWD_ID ,
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
ENG_MEAN,
CCH_NM,
ORG_DS,
OBJ_DESCN,
WD_DCD,
OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID
,DMN_YN
, STND_ASRT
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_STWD ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) ,
REPLACE(#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ',''),
UPPER(REPLACE(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ','')) ,
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wdDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, NOW(),
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW(), #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
,#{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
,#{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_STWD
STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_PNM = UPPER(REPLACE(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ','')) ,
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_STWD
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_STWD A LEFT JOIN WAM_STWD B ON B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN B.STWD_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqStwdMapper.checkRequestStwd */
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE D.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkDupStwd */
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkNotExistStwd */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkDupStwdLnm */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkNtChek */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND IFNULL(A.STND_ASRT,'_') = IFNULL(D.STND_ASRT,'_') AND D.SYMN_DCD ='NT' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkSwChek */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.SYMN_DCD ='SW' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkDupStwdPnm */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkUseStwd */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.STWD_ID = A.STWD_ID UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND IFNULL(A.STND_ASRT,'_') = IFNULL(D.STND_ASRT,'_') AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

/* WaqStwdMapper.checkNoChg */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND IFNULL(A.STWD_PNM,'_') = IFNULL(D.STWD_PNM,'_') AND IFNULL(A.ENG_MEAN,'_') = IFNULL(D.ENG_MEAN,'_') AND IFNULL(A.CCH_NM,'_') = IFNULL(D.CCH_NM,'_') AND IFNULL(A.ORG_DS,'_') = IFNULL(D.ORG_DS,'_') AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN,'_') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN,'_') -- AND IFNULL(A.WD_DCD,'_') = IFNULL(D.WD_DCD,'_') AND IFNULL(A.STND_ASRT,'_') = IFNULL(D.STND_ASRT,'_') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.sql: , STWD_LNM , STWD_PNM , ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqStwdMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_STWD A LEFT JOIN WAM_STWD B ON B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') SET A.STWD_ID = B.STWD_ID , A.OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 , A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD X WHERE X.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND X.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND X.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: DELETE A /* WaqStwdMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_STWD A INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD B ON B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_STWD A INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD B ON B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqStwdMapper.insertWaqRejected */ INTO WAQ_STWD( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_STWD A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqStwdMapper.updateStwdDelInfo */ WAQ_STWD A LEFT JOIN WAM_STWD B ON B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.ENG_MEAN = B.ENG_MEAN , A.CCH_NM = B.CCH_NM , A.ORG_DS = B.ORG_DS , A.WD_DCD = B.WD_DCD , A.DMN_YN = B.DMN_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN = B.OBJ_DESCN , A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD X WHERE X.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND X.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )
